options.description: number of segments kept in the manifest (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.description: number of segments kept outside of the manifest before removing from disk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

options.name: seg_duration
options.description: segment duration (in seconds, fractional value can be set) (default 5)

options.name: frag_duration
options.description: fragment duration (in seconds, fractional value can be set) (default 0)

options.name: frag_type
options.description: set type of interval for fragments (from 0 to 3) (default none)

options.name: use_template
options.description: Use SegmentTemplate instead of SegmentList (default true)

options.name: use_timeline
options.description: Use SegmentTimeline in SegmentTemplate (default true)

options.name: single_file
options.description: Store all segments in one file, accessed using byte ranges (default false)

options.name: single_file_name
options.description: DASH-templated name to be used for baseURL. Implies storing all segments in one file, accessed using byte ranges

options.name: init_seg_name
options.description: DASH-templated name to used for the initialization segment (default "init-stream$RepresentationID$.$ext$")

options.name: media_seg_name
options.description: DASH-templated name to used for the media segments (default "chunk-stream$RepresentationID$-$Number%05d$.$ext$")

options.description: URL of the page that will return the UTC timestamp in ISO format

options.description: override User-Agent field in HTTP header

options.description: HLS master playlist name (default "master.m3u8")

options.name: streaming
options.description: Enable/Disable streaming mode of output. Each frame will be moof fragment (default false)

options.name: timeout
options.description: set timeout for socket I/O operations (default -0.000001)

options.name: index_correction
options.description: Enable/Disable segment index correction logic (default false)

options.name: format_options
options.description: set list of options for the container format (mp4/webm) used for dash

options.name: global_sidx

options.name: dash_segment_type
options.description: set dash segment files type (from 0 to 2) (default auto)

options.name: lhls

options.name: ldash
options.description: Enable Low-latency dash. Constrains the value of a few elements (default false)

options.name: master_m3u8_publish_rate
options.description: Publish master playlist every after this many segment intervals (from 0 to UINT32_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: write_prft
options.description: Write producer reference time element (default auto)

options.name: mpd_profile
options.description: Set profiles. Elements and values used in the manifest may be constrained by them (default dash)

options.name: target_latency
options.description: Set desired target latency for Low-latency dash (default 0)

options.name: min_playback_rate
options.description: Set desired minimum playback rate (from 0.5 to 1.5) (default 1/1)

options.name: max_playback_rate
options.description: Set desired maximum playback rate (from 0.5 to 1.5) (default 1/1)

options.name: update_period
options.description: Set the mpd update interval (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)

options.description: StreamMuxConfig interval. (from 1 to 65535) (default 20)

options.description: Reserve a given amount of space (in bytes) at the beginning of the file for the index (cues). (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.description: Move Cues (the index) to the front by shifting data if necessary (default false)

options.name: cluster_size_limit
options.description: Store at most the provided amount of bytes in a cluster.  (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default -1)

options.name: cluster_time_limit
options.description: Store at most the provided number of milliseconds in a cluster. (from -1 to I64_MAX) (default -1)

options.name: live
options.description: Write files assuming it is a live stream. (default false)

options.name: allow_raw_vfw
options.description: allow RAW VFW mode (default false)

options.name: flipped_raw_rgb
options.description: Raw RGB bitmaps in VFW mode are stored bottom-up (default false)

options.name: write_crc32
options.description: write a CRC32 element inside every Level 1 element (default true)

options.name: default_mode
options.description: Controls how a track's FlagDefault is inferred (from 0 to 2) (default passthrough)

options.description: set hash to use (default "md5")

options.description: set list of options for the container format used for the segments

options.description: write a single file containing the header

options.name: segment_list_flags

options.name: segment_list_type
options.description: set the segment list type (from -1 to 4) (default -1)

options.description: set segment clocktime offset (default 0)

options.name: segment_clocktime_wrap_duration
options.description: set segment clocktime wrapping duration (default INT64_MAX)

options.name: segment_time
options.description: set segment duration (default 2)

options.name: segment_time_delta
options.description: set approximation value used for the segment times (default 0)

options.name: min_seg_duration
options.description: set minimum segment duration (default 0)

options.name: segment_times
options.description: set segment split time points

options.name: segment_frames
options.description: set segment split frame numbers

options.name: segment_wrap
options.description: set number after which the index wraps (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: segment_list_entry_prefix
options.description: set base url prefix for segments

options.name: segment_start_number
options.description: set the sequence number of the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: segment_wrap_number
options.description: set the number of wrap before the first segment (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: strftime
options.description: set filename expansion with strftime at segment creation (default false)

options.name: increment_tc
options.description: increment timecode between each segment (default false)

options.name: break_non_keyframes
options.description: allow breaking segments on non-keyframes (default false)

options.name: individual_header_trailer
options.description: write header/trailer to each segment (default true)

options.name: write_header_trailer
options.description: write a header to the first segment and a trailer to the last one (default true)

options.name: reset_timestamps
options.description: reset timestamps at the beginning of each segment (default false)

options.name: initial_offset
options.description: set initial timestamp offset (default 0)

options.name: write_empty_segments
options.description: allow writing empty 'filler' segments (default false)

options.name: window_size
options.description: number of fragments kept in the manifest (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: extra_window_size
options.description: number of fragments kept outside of the manifest before removing from disk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5)

options.name: lookahead_count
options.description: number of lookahead fragments (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 2)

options.name: min_frag_duration
options.description: minimum fragment duration (in microseconds) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5000000)

options.name: remove_at_exit
options.description: remove all fragments when finished (default false)

options.name: spdif_flags
options.description: IEC 61937 encapsulation flags (default 0)

options.name: dtshd_fallback_time
options.description: min secs to strip HD for after an overflow (-1: till the end, default 60) (from -1 to INT_MAX) (default 60)

options.name: chunk_start_index
options.description: start index of the chunk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: header
options.description: filename of the header where the initialization data will be written

options.name: audio_chunk_duration
options.description: duration of each chunk in milliseconds (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 5000)

options.name: method
options.description: set the HTTP method

name: webm_dash_manifest
info:
Muxer webm_dash_manifest [WebM DASH Manifest]:
Mime type: application/xml.

options.name: adaptation_sets
options.description: Adaptation sets. Syntax: id=0,streams=0,1,2 id=1,streams=3,4 and so on

options.name: live
options.description: create a live stream manifest (default false)

options.name: chunk_start_index
options.description: start index of the chunk (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: chunk_duration_ms
options.description: duration of each chunk (in milliseconds) (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 1000)

options.name: utc_timing_url
options.description: URL of the page that will return the UTC timestamp in ISO format

options.name: time_shift_buffer_depth
options.description: Smallest time (in seconds) shifting buffer for which any Representation is guaranteed to be available. (from 1 to DBL_MAX) (default 60)

options.name: minimum_update_period
options.description: Minimum Update Period (in seconds) of the manifest. (from 0 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: loop
options.description: Number of times to loop the output: 0 - infinite loop (from 0 to 65535) (default 1)

name: webvtt
info:
Muxer webvtt [WebVTT subtitle]:
Mime type: text/vtt.

name: wv
info:
Muxer wv [raw WavPack]:
Mime type: audio/x-wavpack.

options.name: display_name
options.description: set display name

options.name: window_id
options.description: set existing window id (from 0 to I64_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: window_size
options.description: set window forced size

options.name: window_title
options.description: set window title

options.name: window_x
options.description: set window x offset (from -2.14748e+09 to INT_MAX) (default 0)

options.name: window_y
options.description: set window y offset (from -2.14748e+09 to INT_MAX) (default 0)
